title: Porfirii
author: Porfirii
content: This morning I was contacted via Telegram by some stranger who claimed to work for some online casino where he detected a vulnerability in. He proposed me to exploit this vulnerability, and in exchange to give him the 40% of the benefits.I have obviously rejected his request, and I am almost sure this is a scam. I don't know whether this is a usual strategy, but take care out there...

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: This is not related to gambling, you can move it to scam accusation.I am surprised that no snapshots of the telegram conversation between you and the scammer to make your post more truthful. That is telegram. I remember a time on telegram that a scammer messaged me, asking me if I know about meta trader or something. He told me he can help out and I will start making money in just 24 hours. I knew he was a scammer. Avoid such people.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 04, 2022, 09:11:02 PMThis is not related to gambling, you can move it to scam accusation.I am surprised that no snapshots of the telegram conversation between you and the scammer to make your post more truthful. That is telegram. I remember a time on telegram that a scammer messaged me, asking me if I know about meta trader or something. He told me he can help out and I will start making money in just 24 hours. I knew he was a scammer. Avoid such people.This may belong to the gambling discussion because someone wanted to trick him using a casino and gamble in it, and have a discussion with other member of community if they had received the same offer.Somehow I experience the same thing years ago and from telegram platform also.  He was saying that he is one of the admin of a casino, and wanted to offer me a huge win.  Then we can split the winnings.  He even promised to give funds to my account just to go with his plan.  It was enticing but I rejected the offer because of the possible problem I might face if I agree with his deal.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: there are possibilities you are active on gambling groups on your telegram, members of those groups are scammers that use the subject of your interest on gambling to scam you. Be conscious of any new chats from unknown contacts on your telegram, you can also improve your security on the app to restrict unknown individual sending messages. You are likely see more on twitter and you dont have to respond to them

comments.author: Joswa Russell
comments.body: There are a lot of scammers in these groups. So, it’s better not to join them. Or you can change the settings of your app. This will prevent from random people to text you

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I was scammed by Telegram and to this date I know who the Scammer is but Telegram says they will not do anything about it.  It is a program enabling Scammers and we see so many of threads like this one and I hope that you did the right thing and Blocked and Reported Him.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: Porfirii on August 04, 2022, 08:59:47 PMThis morning I was contacted via Telegram by some stranger who claimed to work for some online casino where he detected a vulnerability in. He proposed me to exploit this vulnerability, and in exchange to give him the 40% of the benefits.I have obviously rejected his request, and I am almost sure this is a scam. I don't know whether this is a usual strategy, but take care out there...I've seen the same story of this scam.It's certainly a scam and he'll ask you for some deposits and with the promised of interesting returns. Well, good thing that you've sensed already the scam within.Don't believe on these people that are reasoning an exploit to a casino, it's better for them to report it and given a reward instead of abusing it only if there's really a problem.Quote from: mich on August 08, 2022, 05:33:15 AMI was scammed by Telegram and to this date I know who the Scammer is but Telegram says they will not do anything about it.  It is a program enabling Scammers and we see so many of threads like this one and I hope that you did the right thing and Blocked and Reported Him. Are you sure that it was Telegram that scammed? The platform itself is being used by scammers.

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 04, 2022, 09:11:02 PMI am surprised that no snapshots of the telegram conversation between you and the scammer to make your post more truthful. Indeed! it is a pitty that "she" deleted the conversation before I took the snapshots, otherwise I would've uploaded them and added to the Opening Post.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Any stranger reaching out to you on telegram is 99.9% a scammer. If I were you I would avoid them. You can turn off the option of being contacted by strangers or added to groups in the Telegram options. I would recommend turning both off. I did and I have my peace now.

comments.author: mayfair_coin
comments.body: Most scammers will contact you, there is more scammers who find you and offers spectaculous scheme to become rich easily but why he doesn't adopt this scheme himself and why are they telling his secret, that nobody in this world except parents wants u to be happy so avoid such people, they are scammers and they will go away with your money.

comments.author: Morosophy
comments.body: Telegram is the worst place to be. There are so many scams happening there. Avoid joining random trading groups. And change your settings please.

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: I am not surprised at all that scammers moved from e-mail to telegram. They keep up with the progress. Be careful, Telegram can't actully punish scammers, even if you get caught and send a complaint. It is better to forbid strangers to contact you in the settings

comments.author: Stable090
comments.body: Whenever you are on telegram don’t trust anybody that Dm you telling you they are from support or customer care and they will like to help you, all of them are scammers just trying  to steal from the little you are having. If anybody message you just report and block the person instantly.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: nowadays there are so many scammers. whether it be online or offline. we have to be careful.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Even if you just follow the Bitcoin Magazine's page on Telegram, you will have some "beautiful asian girls" coming to propose you all kind of scams lolThey are hungry

comments.author: LosNoches
comments.body: There are a lot of scams in telegrams right now, be careful

comments.author: d3nz
comments.body: Quote from: Porfirii on August 04, 2022, 08:59:47 PMThis morning I was contacted via Telegram by some stranger who claimed to work for some online casino where he detected a vulnerability in. He proposed me to exploit this vulnerability, and in exchange to give him the 40% of the benefits.I have obviously rejected his request, and I am almost sure this is a scam. I don't know whether this is a usual strategy, but take care out there...Scammers on telegram are increasing day by day, and the only solution is to auto-ignore these kinds of people even though they are messaging you about the information of a project that you are joining and trying to get your attention and take the bait. I think that you can limit the message that you are receiving on security settings.

comments.author: CoDeRE
comments.body: Quote from: d3nz on December 30, 2022, 08:08:09 AMQuote from: Porfirii on August 04, 2022, 08:59:47 PMThis morning I was contacted via Telegram by some stranger who claimed to work for some online casino where he detected a vulnerability in. He proposed me to exploit this vulnerability, and in exchange to give him the 40% of the benefits.I have obviously rejected his request, and I am almost sure this is a scam. I don't know whether this is a usual strategy, but take care out there...Scammers on telegram are increasing day by day, and the only solution is to auto-ignore these kinds of people even though they are messaging you about the information of a project that you are joining and trying to get your attention and take the bait. I think that you can limit the message that you are receiving on security settings. If you ask me, simple care will save you from losing money and your account

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: indeed we must always be vigilant, there are many out there who want to deceive us via the internet.

comments.author: Myraly
comments.body: In recent years, the number of scams via Telegram has increased, immediately throw these messages in your spam
